mapper.insert: insert into user (userName, passwdMd5, nickName, registerDate) values (#{userName}, #{passwdMd5}, #{nickName}, #{registerDate})
insert into user (userName, passwdMd5, nickName, registerDate) values (#{user.userName}, #{user.passwdMd5}, #{user.nickName}, #{user.registerDate})
mapper.delete: delete from user where uid in #{id}
